d.f: ￹￺to slide down * landslide￻滑落，滑動下來，崩坍

e: ￹`Ma~`serer~ `to~ `ko~ `'orip~ `ita~ `anini~.￺We have a less affluent life style now than before.￻現在我們的生活沒有以前富裕
￹`Ma~`serer~ `to~ `ko~ `'icel~ `nira~.￺He has lost strength.￻他體力減退很多
￹`Ma~`serer~ `ko~ `'aca~ `no~ `dateng~.￺The price of vegetables has come down.￻蔬菜降價了
￹`Sreren~ `no~ `tawki~ `ko~ `matayalay~ `nira~.￺The boss gave his worker a lesser position.￻老闆把工人的地位降低
d.f: ￹￺to come down figuratively￻退化，降落，低落(比喻上)
